name: The Crazy Christmas Game
description:
The Crazy Christmas Game is a classic single player board game. Now you can play it on your phone or computer!

The task is simple: Align the 9 cards so that all of the images between the cards match up. Beware. This game is deceptively difficult. You will quickly learn why it is called the "Crazy" Christmas game. You might just go mad before you finish this little puzzle...

Enjoy!
